activities: We collect consumer information for our Retail clients based on the loyalty and segmentation services that we offer.  The information that we collect (via opt-in) varies by client but is limited to name, email address, mailing address, date of birth and gender.  This information is kept on our propriety, cloud-based platform that is housed by Amazon Web Service and is PCI level 2 compliant.  Data is captured and stored automatically without manual involvement.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Clutch uses an opt-in process is for consumers who chose to join a brand's loyalty program - this is our sole means for collecting consumer data.    The data covered under this self-certification does not include manually processed data.   The data that Clutch obtains on behalf of our clients includes name, email address, mailing address, gender and potentially, date of birth.
privacyprograms: Clutch utilizes a clearly defined, self-regulatory process for managing privacy.
recoursemech: Clutch subscribes to the Better Business Bureau's EU Safe Harbor Dispute Resolution Procedure.
